note.p: Indexer. Worked for John Murray. Daughter of Anne Palgrave and Edward Rigby. Cousin of Maria Turner, Joseph Dalton Hooker’s mother. Married James Smith (1808–71), an East India merchant, in 1847. Mother of Matilda Smith (1854–1926), the botanical artist. Indexed Cross and self fertilisation, Forms of flowers, and Movement in plants.
